summary: Building a dropshipping e-commerce website that collects products from Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, and BlinkIt, allows customers to purchase at marked-up prices, and dropships directly from the source platforms. Features include shopping cart, checkout, payment processing, and order management. Email notifications and automatic stock checking requested but blocked by platform limitations.
architectural_notes: Multi-platform e-commerce aggregator requiring product data indexing from Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, BlinkIt, and other shopping platforms
Will need product search and filtering capabilities across aggregated data
Dropshipping business model: customers purchase through website at markup prices, orders fulfilled by purchasing from source platforms (Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, BlinkIt)
Payment processing requires Stripe integration (paid subscription feature)
Email notifications blocked by platform (requires paid subscription upgrade)
Automatic stock checking not supported due to platform limitations (no external API calls)
Returns policy: accept returns only if original seller platform accepts returns
known_issues: Email feature disabled - cannot send order confirmations or shipping updates without paid subscription
Cannot perform automatic stock checking - platform does not support external API calls to e-commerce platforms
Real-time stock verification would require external services outside this platform

existing_features.title: Create a homepage with a welcoming hero section that includes a headline and subheadline
Implement a navigation header with links to main sections of the website
Add an about section that provides information about the website or its purpose
Create a footer with basic information and links
Apply a creative, cohesive visual design with a distinct aesthetic style using warm earth tones, elegant typography, and a modern minimalist layout that feels professional and inviting

Create a Products page in the frontend that displays the indexed products from all shopping platforms in a grid layout with product cards showing image, name, price, platform badge, and a link to the original product
Add a search bar component to the Products page that allows users to search products by name or filter by platform
Update the navigation header to include a Products link that navigates to the new Products page
Update the Hero section headline and subheadline to reflect the shopping product index functionality across Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, BlinkIt, and other platforms

Create a shopping cart component that allows users to add products from the product catalog, view cart items with product details (name, image, price, quantity), update quantities, remove items, and display the total cart value in INR

Create a checkout page that collects customer information including full name, shipping address (street, city, state, postal code), phone number, and email address, with form validation for all required fields
Integrate Stripe payment processing on the checkout page to accept customer payments in INR, with a payment form that processes card payments and displays success/error messages

Create an admin order management dashboard page that displays all customer orders in a table format showing order ID, customer name, order date, total amount, order status, and actions to view order details, update status, and add fulfillment notes

Update the product pricing display throughout the application to show marked-up reselling prices instead of original platform prices, with a configurable markup percentage or fixed amount stored in the backend
Add a customer order tracking page where customers can view their order history by entering their email address or order ID, showing order status, items ordered, shipping address, and order timeline

Display a prominent notification banner on checkout and order management pages informing users that email notifications are currently unavailable and orders will need to be tracked manually through the order tracking page

Add a manual stock verification workflow to the order management dashboard where the admin can mark stock availability status for each order item before processing, with options to indicate 'Available on Platform', 'Out of Stock - Check Official Website', or 'Unavailable', and display platform URLs for manual verification

Add a returns and refunds section to the order details page that displays the return policy of the original platform (Amazon, Flipkart, Meesho, or BlinkIt) where the product was sourced, with a note that returns are accepted only if the original platform accepts returns
